metadata.Title: CVE-2015-7384 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
Node.js 4.0.0, 4.1.0, and 4.1.1 allows remote attackers to cause a denialof service.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-7384` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

nodejs - 8.10.0~dfsg-2
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: nodejs package in esm-apps/bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '8.10.0~dfsg-2').
